document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2016-12
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON ADOPTING BY REFERENCE THE 2016 EDITIONS OF THE CALIFORNIA CODE OF REGULATIONS TITLE 24 AND RELATED MODEL CODES WITH APPENDICES AND AMENDMENTS AS IDENTIFIED HEREIN THROUGH EXPRESS FINDINGS OF LOCAL NECESSITY; REPEALING CHAPTERS 16.02 THROUGH 16.08 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE AND ALL OTHER CONFLICTING ORDINANCES AND PARTS OF ORDINANCES
